title: Kate Bush - Hounds Of Love (1985) - 2010, [24/96], Vinyl Rip

Audio Fidelity (AFZLP 087) / EMI 

USA LP, Vinyl Rip, 24/96, FLAC (tracks+.cue)

 Hounds of Love

Side two:
 The Ninth Wave

 07 - Under Ice (2:21)
 08 - Waking the Witch (4:18)
 09 - Watching You Without Me (4:06)
 10 - Jig of Life (4:04)
 11 - Hello Earth (6:13)
 12 - The Morning Fog (2:34)

All songs written by Kate Bush.
